readable.title: 3016521240_2ef20834b6
readable.content: A girl holds a blow-up tiger while another girl is in a costume . A girl sits on a bench holding an inflatable tiger next to another girl in a colorful outfit . Girls sit in costumes . The girl wearing black is holding a toy and is sitting next to a girl in costume . Two women sitting on a bench , their faces obscured , with one woman carrying an inflatable tiger and the other woman in a Disney snow white costume .
